caption: Relating to the issuance of gold and silver specie and the establishment of a currency based on gold and silver; authorizing a fee.
undersanding:
Summary (under 80 words):
This bill establishes a gold and silver-based currency system in Texas through the Texas Bullion Depository. People can convert USD or existing precious metals into this new currency, which can be used as legal tender or redeemed back to USD or physical metals. The system includes a pooled depository account and transaction fees. No specific restrictions or impacts on Chinese immigrants or citizens are mentioned in the bill.

中文翻译：
该法案建立了德克萨斯州基于黄金和白银的货币系统，通过德克萨斯贵金属储存库运作。民众可以将美元或现有贵金属转换为这种新货币，可用作法定货币或兑换回美元或实物金属。系统包括集中存储账户和交易费用。法案中未提及对中国移民或公民的具体限制或影响。
